Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Three ( 4 . 1 % ) of the 73 patients were positive for MPO - ANCA at 13 , 16 and 17 months , respectively , after the start of PTU therapy .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| PTU (Phenylthiourea) |
| MPO (Myeloperoxidase) |
| ANCA (Antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibodies) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| PTU (Phenylthiourea) |
| MPO (Myeloperoxidase) |

In the original paragraph, "Three ( 4 . 1 % ) of the 73 patients were positive for MPO - ANCA" indicates that MPO and ANCA are the chemical entities being referred to. ANCA is an antibody, but it is often considered a chemical entity in the context of immunology, as it is a complex of antibodies that react with specific antigens on neutrophils. Therefore, it is included in the table. PTU is mentioned earlier in the paragraph as the therapy being administered, so it is also included as a chemical entity.
